A poem for one of the newest monsters,Ripper
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: A poem for one of the newest monsters,Ripper
By Icelord13 on Wednesday, December 31, 2003 - 09:46 am:

This is one I quickly put together in a short amount of time. Hope you like it.


A ripper will use its’ super long tail,
to pop you a good one, and make you wail.
A slender body, nice and thin,
it’s easy to score a tournament win.

Fur that is purple and white,
it shows its’ claws and you cower in fright.
A super attack, it will send,
another monster injury for you to mend.

You should consider raising a ripper,
in the tourneys, you’ll feel much hipper.
As you and your ripper, stand in all your might,
the other monsters will forfeit the fight.

As you can see, rippers are the best,
toppling all of the rest.
You’re ripper’s really strong, oh yes,
you’ll soon be winning in Class S!

How'd you like it? Please comment.
